item.title: SHAFT!
item.description: I was trying to create an arrangement of the Theme from SHAFT that could be played by a 3-piece rock band (which I had at the time). I failed because I needed 2 guitar parts, so we never played it. This was recorded on 4-track cassette in the early 90's with the same kind of drum machine that Nenah Cherry used Donate by PayPal - http://hardcorezen.info/donate My Patreon page - https://www.patreon.com/user?u=4874189 LETTERS TO A DEAD FRIEND ABOUT ZEN audiobook - https://www.audible.com/pd/Letters-to-a-Dead-Friend-About-Zen-Audiobook/B081J5WM8F?qid=1637091907&sr=1-1&ref=a_search_c3_lProduct_1_1&pf_rd_p=83218cca-c308-412f-bfcf-90198b687a2f&pf_rd_r=4CP8P80399D73MQKC7PH My other audiobooks - https://www.audible.com/search?keywords=brad+warner&ref-override=a_search_t1_header_search&ref=nb_sb_ss_i_1_11&k=brad+warner&crid=1IHW7QAIT5K83&sprefix=brad+warner%2Cna-audible-us%2C109&i=na-audible-us&url=search-alias%3Dna-audible-us My blog - http://hardcorezen.info Write me at bw@hardcorezen.info
